Post.content:
#
abortcore
backtrace

#

#include "base.h"
#include "stdio.h"
boost::shared_ptr<std::string> err_str;
boost::shared_ptr<std::string> normal_str2;
int main(int argc, char **argv)
{
    err_str.reset();
    normal_str2 = boost::shared_ptr<std::string>(new std::string);
    *normal_str2 = "test";
    printf("before\n");
    std::string l_test_str = *(err_str); // !!!
    printf("after\n");
    printf("%c\n", normal_str2->at(0));
    return 0;
}

BOOST_ASSERTabortgdbresetbefore

#include "base.h"
#include "stdio.h"
boost::shared_ptr<std::string> err_str;
boost::shared_ptr<std::string> normal_str2;
int main(int argc, char **argv)
{
    err_str.reset();
    normal_str2 = boost::shared_ptr<std::string>(new std::string);
    *normal_str2 = "test";
    printf("before\n");
    assert(err_str.get()); // !!!
    printf("after\n");
    printf("%c\n", normal_str2->at(0));
    return 0;
}

Post.title: nginx-rtmp-module summary
Post.content:
##:
https://github.com/arut/nginx-rtmp-module

##
nginx-rtmp-modulenginxnginxwiki

##

###
rtmphttpeventshttpnginx_rtmp.chttp

nginx-rtmp-modulecorehlsnginx_rtmp.c

rtmp

rtmp {
    server {

        listen 1935; # 1935

        application live {
            live on; #    

            hls on;  # HLS
            hls_path /tmp/tv26; # HLS

            recorder record_tv26{ # 
                record all; # 
                record_path /tmp/rec; # 
            }   
        }   
    }   


/* rtmp{}rtmp */
static char *
ngx_rtmp_block(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf)
{
    char                        *rv;
    ngx_uint_t                   i, m, mi, s;
    ngx_conf_t                   pcf;
    ngx_array_t                  ports;
    ngx_rtmp_listen_t           *listen;
    ngx_rtmp_module_t           *module;
    ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t         *ctx;
    ngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t    *cscf, **cscfp;
    ngx_rtmp_core_main_conf_t   *cmcf;

    /* 
    typedef struct {
        void                  **main_conf;
        void                  **srv_conf;
        void                  **app_conf;
    } ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t;
     * serverapplicationmain_confrtmp{}main_conf
     */
    ctx = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t));
    if (ctx == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    *(ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t **) conf = ctx;

    /* count the number of the rtmp modules and set up their indices */
    /* RTMP */

    ngx_rtmp_max_module = 0;
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index = ngx_rtmp_max_module++;
    }


    /* the rtmp main_conf context, it is the same in the all rtmp contexts */
    /* main_conf */
    ctx->main_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool,
                                 sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);// max
    if (ctx->main_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }


    /*
     * the rtmp null srv_conf context, it is used to merge
     * the server{}s' srv_conf's
     * srv_conf
     */

    ctx->srv_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);
    if (ctx->srv_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }


    /*
     * the rtmp null app_conf context, it is used to merge
     * the server{}s' app_conf's
     * app_conf
     */

    ctx->app_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);
    if (ctx->app_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }


    /*
     * create the main_conf's, the null srv_conf's, and the null app_conf's
     * of the all rtmp modules
     */
    /* RTMPconf */

    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;
        mi = ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index;

        // :
        // create_main_conf
        // create_srv_conf
        // create_app_conf
        if (module->create_main_conf) {
            ctx->main_conf[mi] = module->create_main_conf(cf);
            if (ctx->main_conf[mi] == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }
        }

        if (module->create_srv_conf) {
            ctx->srv_conf[mi] = module->create_srv_conf(cf);
            if (ctx->srv_conf[mi] == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }
        }

        if (module->create_app_conf) {
            ctx->app_conf[mi] = module->create_app_conf(cf);
            if (ctx->app_conf[mi] == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }
        }
    }

    // ngx_conf_trtmp{}
    pcf = *cf;
    cf->ctx = ctx;

    // RTMPpreconfiguration
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;

        if (module->preconfiguration) {
            if (module->preconfiguration(cf) != NGX_OK) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }
        }
    }

    /* parse inside the rtmp{} block */
    /* rtmp{}cmd_type=NGX_RTMP_MAIN_CONFserver{}
     * ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t
     * main_confsrv_confapp_conf
     * main_confngx_rtmp_*_main_conf_tcore

        typedef struct {
            ngx_array_t             servers;    // ngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t 
            ngx_array_t             listen;     // ngx_rtmp_listen_t 

            ngx_array_t             events[NGX_RTMP_MAX_EVENT];

            ngx_hash_t              amf_hash;
            ngx_array_t             amf_arrays;
            ngx_array_t             amf;
        } ngx_rtmp_core_main_conf_t;

     * server{}coreservers
     * srv_confngx_rtmp_*_srv_main_tcoreserver

        typedef struct ngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_s {
            ngx_array_t             applications; // ngx_rtmp_core_app_conf_t
            ...            
            ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t    *ctx;
        } ngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t;

     * application{}serverapplications */

    cf->module_type = NGX_RTMP_MODULE;
    cf->cmd_type = NGX_RTMP_MAIN_CONF;
    rv = ngx_conf_parse(cf, NULL);

    if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
        *cf = pcf;
        return rv;
    }


    /* init rtmp{} main_conf's, merge the server{}s' srv_conf's */

    // cmcf => core module conf
    cmcf = ctx->main_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];
    cscfp = cmcf->servers.elts;

    /* RTMP 
     * coreconfigctx
     * NGX_RTMP_MODULENGX_CORE_MODULE
     */
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;
        // mi => module_index
        mi = ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index;

        /* init rtmp{} main_conf's */
        /* maininit_main_conf */

        cf->ctx = ctx;

        // RTMP maininit_main_confmain_confmerge
        if (module->init_main_conf) {
            rv = module->init_main_conf(cf, ctx->main_conf[mi]);
            if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
                *cf = pcf;
                return rv;
            }
        }

        /* merge_srv_confmerge_app_conf
         * ngx_parse_confservers*/
        for (s = 0; s < cmcf->servers.nelts; s++) {

            /* merge the server{}s' srv_conf's */

            cf->ctx = cscfp[s]->ctx;

            if (module->merge_srv_conf) {
                rv = module->merge_srv_conf(cf,
                                            ctx->srv_conf[mi],
                                            cscfp[s]->ctx->srv_conf[mi]);
                if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
                    *cf = pcf;
                    return rv;
                }
            }

            if (module->merge_app_conf) {

                /* merge the server{}'s app_conf */

                /*ctx->app_conf = cscfp[s]->ctx->loc_conf;*/

                rv = module->merge_app_conf(cf, 
                                            ctx->app_conf[mi],
                                            cscfp[s]->ctx->app_conf[mi]);
                if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
                    *cf = pcf;
                    return rv;
                }

                /* merge the applications{}' app_conf's 
                 * applications
                 * cscfp = core server conf pointer*/

                cscf = cscfp[s]->ctx->srv_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];

                /* applicationsapplicationrecorder{} */
                rv = ngx_rtmp_merge_applications(cf, &cscf->applications,
                                            cscfp[s]->ctx->app_conf,
                                            module, mi);
                if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
                    *cf = pcf;
                    return rv;
                }
            }

        }
    }


    /* eventsamf */
    if (ngx_rtmp_init_events(cf, cmcf) != NGX_OK) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    /* RTMPpostconfiguration */
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;

        if (module->postconfiguration) {
            if (module->postconfiguration(cf) != NGX_OK) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }
        }
    }

    // conf
    *cf = pcf;

    /* RTMPAMFhash */
    if (ngx_rtmp_init_event_handlers(cf, cmcf) != NGX_OK) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    /*  */
    if (ngx_array_init(&ports, cf->temp_pool, 4, sizeof(ngx_rtmp_conf_port_t))
        != NGX_OK)
    {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    listen = cmcf->listen.elts;

    // listenport
    for (i = 0; i < cmcf->listen.nelts; i++) {
        if (ngx_rtmp_add_ports(cf, &ports, &listen[i]) != NGX_OK) {
            return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
        }
    }

    /* portnginx */
    return ngx_rtmp_optimize_servers(cf, &ports);
}

rtmp{}coreserver{}applicaiton{}ngx_rtmp_core_module.c

static char *
ngx_rtmp_core_server(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf/*srv_conf*/)
{
    char                       *rv;
    void                       *mconf;
    ngx_uint_t                  m;
    ngx_conf_t                  pcf;
    ngx_rtmp_module_t          *module;
    ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t        *ctx, *rtmp_ctx;
    ngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t   *cscf, **cscfp;
    ngx_rtmp_core_main_conf_t  *cmcf;

    // serverconf_ctx
    ctx = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t));
    if (ctx == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    rtmp_ctx = cf->ctx;
    // rtmpconf_ctxmain_confservermain_confmain_conf
    ctx->main_conf = rtmp_ctx->main_conf;

    /* the server{}'s srv_conf */
    /* srv_confapp_conf */

    ctx->srv_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);
    if (ctx->srv_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    ctx->app_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);
    if (ctx->app_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    // srv_confapp_conf
    // RTMPcreate_srv_confcreate_app_conf
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;

        if (module->create_srv_conf) {
            mconf = module->create_srv_conf(cf);
            if (mconf == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }

            ctx->srv_conf[ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index] = mconf;
        }

        if (module->create_app_conf) {
            mconf = module->create_app_conf(cf);
            if (mconf == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }

            ctx->app_conf[ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index] = mconf;
        }
    }

    /* the server configuration context */
    /* conf_ctxmain_confservers
     * serversngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t*/
    cscf = ctx->srv_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];
    cscf->ctx = ctx; // servers
    /* server{}main_conf[core_module]->servers[...]->ctx->srv_conf[core_module]server{}
     * application{}applicationapplications[]
     */

    cmcf = ctx->main_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];

    cscfp = ngx_array_push(&cmcf->servers);/* main_confserversmain_conf */
    if (cscfp == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    *cscfp = cscf;

    /* parse inside server{} 
     * server{}NGX_RTMP_SRV_CONFlistenapplication
    */

    pcf = *cf;
    cf->ctx = ctx;
    cf->cmd_type = NGX_RTMP_SRV_CONF;

    rv = ngx_conf_parse(cf, NULL);

    *cf = pcf;

    return rv;
}

                 * cscfp = core server conf pointer*/

                cscf = cscfp[s]->ctx->srv_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];

                /* applicationsapplicationrecorder{} */
                rv = ngx_rtmp_merge_applications(cf, &cscf->applications,
                                            cscfp[s]->ctx->app_conf,
                                            module, mi);
                if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
                    *cf = pcf;
                    return rv;
                }
            }

        }
    }


    /* eventsamf */
    if (ngx_rtmp_init_events(cf, cmcf) != NGX_OK) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    /* RTMPpostconfiguration */
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;

        if (module->postconfiguration) {
            if (module->postconfiguration(cf) != NGX_OK) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }
        }
    }

    // conf
    *cf = pcf;

    /* RTMPAMFhash */
    if (ngx_rtmp_init_event_handlers(cf, cmcf) != NGX_OK) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    /*  */
    if (ngx_array_init(&ports, cf->temp_pool, 4, sizeof(ngx_rtmp_conf_port_t))
        != NGX_OK)
    {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    listen = cmcf->listen.elts;

    // listenport
    for (i = 0; i < cmcf->listen.nelts; i++) {
        if (ngx_rtmp_add_ports(cf, &ports, &listen[i]) != NGX_OK) {
            return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
        }
    }

    /* portnginx */
    return ngx_rtmp_optimize_servers(cf, &ports);
}

rtmp{}coreserver{}applicaiton{}ngx_rtmp_core_module.c

static char *
ngx_rtmp_core_server(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf/*srv_conf*/)
{
    char                       *rv;
    void                       *mconf;
    ngx_uint_t                  m;
    ngx_conf_t                  pcf;
    ngx_rtmp_module_t          *module;
    ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t        *ctx, *rtmp_ctx;
    ngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t   *cscf, **cscfp;
    ngx_rtmp_core_main_conf_t  *cmcf;

    // serverconf_ctx
    ctx = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(ngx_rtmp_conf_ctx_t));
    if (ctx == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    rtmp_ctx = cf->ctx;
    // rtmpconf_ctxmain_confservermain_confmain_conf
    ctx->main_conf = rtmp_ctx->main_conf;

    /* the server{}'s srv_conf */
    /* srv_confapp_conf */

    ctx->srv_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);
    if (ctx->srv_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    ctx->app_conf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(void *) * ngx_rtmp_max_module);
    if (ctx->app_conf == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    // srv_confapp_conf
    // RTMPcreate_srv_confcreate_app_conf
    for (m = 0; ngx_modules[m]; m++) {
        if (ngx_modules[m]->type != NGX_RTMP_MODULE) {
            continue;
        }

        module = ngx_modules[m]->ctx;

        if (module->create_srv_conf) {
            mconf = module->create_srv_conf(cf);
            if (mconf == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }

            ctx->srv_conf[ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index] = mconf;
        }

        if (module->create_app_conf) {
            mconf = module->create_app_conf(cf);
            if (mconf == NULL) {
                return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
            }

            ctx->app_conf[ngx_modules[m]->ctx_index] = mconf;
        }
    }

    /* the server configuration context */
    /* conf_ctxmain_confservers
     * serversngx_rtmp_core_srv_conf_t*/
    cscf = ctx->srv_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];
    cscf->ctx = ctx; // servers
    /* server{}main_conf[core_module]->servers[...]->ctx->srv_conf[core_module]server{}
     * application{}applicationapplications[]
     */

    cmcf = ctx->main_conf[ngx_rtmp_core_module.ctx_index];

    cscfp = ngx_array_push(&cmcf->servers);/* main_confserversmain_conf */
    if (cscfp == NULL) {
        return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
    }

    *cscfp = cscf;

    /* parse inside server{} 
     * server{}NGX_RTMP_SRV_CONFlistenapplication
    */

    pcf = *cf;
    cf->ctx = ctx;
    cf->cmd_type = NGX_RTMP_SRV_CONF;

    rv = ngx_conf_parse(cf, NULL);

    *cf = pcf;

    return rv;
}

Post.title: Fix: Nexus 7(2013) Wifi OTG Storage Issue
Post._content:
Nexus Photo Viewer([Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.homeysoft.nexususb.viewer))([blogspot](http://nexususb.blogspot.com/))



1. Hold the device in Portrait Mode
2. Open Android Settings and make the following __temporary__ changes
3. Under Security -> Lock Screen.  Select None
4. Under Accessibility -> Auto-rotate screen.  Make sure it is NOT checked
5. __(Nexus 7 2013 Only)__ Under Language and input -> English (United States)____
6. Open NMI/NPV manually via the icon.Nexus Photo Viewer
7. Connect the OTG and Flash/Pen DriveOTS
8. Press and Hold Power until you see "Power Off"
9. Tap OK to Power Off
10. Power On
11. Repeat steps 8-10 until you see this prompt or NMI opens automatically.  If you have repeated this more than 5 times see below.\*810Nexus Photo ViewerOTG

---

2013-10-10 

N7OTG____

____OTG

[Jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com/docs/migrations/)jekyll-importUbuntu 12.04ruby1.8rubyruby3

		./configure
		make
		sudo make install

2. update-alternativesruby

		sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/ruby ruby /usr/local/bin/ruby

		/usr/local/bin/ruby
		
3. jekyll-import

		gem install jekyll-import --pre
		gem install hpricot

		ruby -rubygems -e 'require "jekyll/jekyll-import/wordpressdotcom";
    		JekyllImport::WordpressDotCom.process({ :source => "wordpress.xml" })'
    	wordpress.xml
    	


gemtaobao

	gem sources --remove https://rubygems.org/
	gem sources -a http://ruby.taobao.org/
	gem sources -l
	*** CURRENT SOURCES ***
	 
	http://ruby.taobao.org
